skilllist.skilldesc: Upon death, Zhask summons a frenzied <font color="a6aafb">Nightmaric Spawn</font> on the spot, which gradually loses HP over time until death.

Zhask summons a <font color="a6aafb">Nightmaric Spawn</font> that inherits 55% of his Attributes (HP, Hybrid Defense, and Magic Power). <font color="a6aafb">Nightmaric Spawn</font> will automatically attack nearby enemies by firing a <font color="a6aafb">Death Ray</font> at the target, dealing 55 (+<font color="26e407">20% extra Attack Speed</font>) (+<font color="62f8fe">20% Magic Power</font>) <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and slowing them by up to 30%. If Zhask is too far away from <font color="a6aafb">Nightmaric Spawn</font>, it will disappear.
<font color="a6aafb">Death Ray</font> is considered as a Basic Attack but cannot Crit.
<font color="a6aafb">Fusion Enhanced</font>: The damage of <font color="a6aafb">Nightmaric Spawn</font> is increased to 180%, and it can be repositioned.

Zhask fires a penetrating mental missile in the designated direction, dealing 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>. Afterward, <font color="a6aafb">Nightmaric Spawn</font> will attack enemies hit by <font color="a6aafb">Mind Eater</font> for 120<font color="62f8fe"> (+80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and stun them for 0.5s. 

<font color="a6aafb">Fusion Enhanced</font>: Increases the damage dealt by <font color="a6aafb">Mind Eater</font> by 540<font color="62f8fe"> (+180% Total Magic Power)</font>.

Zhask releases a swarm of <font color="a6aafb">Hive Clones</font> in the targeted direction. The clones will explode and deal 55<font color="62f8fe"> (+18% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies on contact, reducing their Movement Speed by 80% for 1s. 
If <font color="a6aafb">Hive Clones</font> find no target, they will burrow into the ground and ambush enemies passing by.
<font color="a6aafb">Fusion Enhanced</font>: Zhask releases several swarms of <font color="a6aafb">Hive Clones</font>.
Subsequent damage dealt to the same target decays to 20%.

Zhask selects a designated position to summon <font color="a6aafb">Nightmaric Spawn</font> and fuses with it. Nightmaric Spawn can inherit 100% of his attributes and get extra of them. His skills are enhanced during the fusion period.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Zhask immediately gets off <font color="a6aafb">Nightmaric Spawn</font> and loses enhancement.

data.name: Zhask

__data.skilldesc: Fire a Flaming Shot in the target direction, <font color="62f8fe">knocking back</font> nearby enemies and dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+0.5 Total Magic Power)</font>-680<font color="62f8fe"> (+1.7 Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> (scales with flying distance) to the first enemy hero or creep hit.
__data.skilldesc_text: Fire a Flaming Shot in the target direction, [C2knocking back] nearby enemies and dealing <Num1>-<Num2> [C1Magic Damage] (scales with flying distance) to the first enemy hero or creep hit.
__data.skilldescemblem: Fire a Flaming Shot in the target direction, <font color="62f8fe">knocking back</font> nearby enemies and dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font>-680<font color="62f8fe"> (+170% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> (scales with flying distance) to the first enemy hero or creep hit.

emblemskill.skilldesc: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage with skills deals 4% of target's Max HP as extra <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> and restores 2% Mana on hit.

<font color="8098ab">If the hero does not use Mana, recovers 1% HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to 120</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 5s</font>

The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to <Num5>[-].########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage with skills deals 4% of target's Max HP as extra <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> and restores 2% Mana on hit.

<font color="8098ab">If the hero does not use Mana, recovers 1% HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to 120</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 5s</font>

equiplist.equipskill1: Mysticism: Getting a kill or assist on an enemy Minion will restore 4% Mana. (An assist occurs when a Minion dies within 2s after taking damage from the hero.)
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mysticism: Getting a kill or assist on an enemy Minion will restore 4% Mana. (An assist occurs when a Minion dies within 2s after taking damage from the hero.)

equiplist.equipskill1: Affliction: Each Basic Attack deals extra 50<font color="62f8fe"> (+0.3 Total Magic Power)</font> Magic Damage.
equiplist.equipskill2: Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Affliction: Each Basic Attack deals extra 50<font color="62f8fe"> (+0.3 Total Magic Power)</font> Magic Damage.
Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+55 Magic Power
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal
+5% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

recommendmasterplan.name: TS - SunsetLover
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: King of the Swarm who disrupts the balance of the universe.

assist.desc: Zhask works best with heroes that can lock down enemies so he can have more time to deal damage, like Belerick and Lolita.

strong.desc: Zhask is strong against burst damage heroes like Aldous and Paquito because his high HP after fusing with his Nightmaric Spawn, makes him tough to burst down.

weak.desc: Zhask is countered by agile or long range heroes, such as Pharsa and Cecilion, because they can quickly step out of range of his immobile Nightmaric Spawn.
